subject: fix: improve tone tag contrast and theme color consistency
body:
- Fix tone tags being same color as own message bubbles by using
  semi-transparent white styling for contrast on blue backgrounds
- Standardize modal backdrops to rgba(0,0,0,0.8) per Koinz style guide
- Update layout background to use theme.colors.background
- Fix placeholder colors to use textSecondary (#767676)
- Convert TutorialModal to use theme colors
- Replace hardcoded text-white/border-white with text-text/border-text
- Update documentation with new tone tag styling approach
title: improve tone tag contrast and theme color consistency
